descriptionHtml:
If you like this mod, you should defenitely take a look at part 1:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22753/?]Part 1[/url]
---------------------------------------------------
Introduction
---------------------------------------------------
An old Arch-Mage of the college of Winterhold called Magor has returned. Though he was presumed dead for a few ages, he re-emerged in a new form. In those years he has collected and discovered a whole range of new spells he\'s willing to share, if you can afford it.

----------------------------------------------------
Short Decsiption
----------------------------------------------------
This is the second part of the Lost Magic spell packs. These mods aim to bring new usefull and above all balanced spells to Skyrim. All of the spells added by this mod can be bought from a new spell vendor called Magor who resides on the second floor of the Hall of Countenance at the College of Winterhold. You can also find the spell-tomes scattered around Skyrim as loot.

----------------------------------------------------
Installation
----------------------------------------------------
Extract the LostMagicPart2.7zip folder and place all the files in you steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data folder.

----------------------------------------------------
Spells
----------------------------------------------------
All spells can be bought from Magor or found as loot throughout Skyrim

Restoration:
1.	Wall of Magnus: create an impenetrable wall around you

Alteration:
1.	Crystal Spikes: Let razor-sharp spikes crystalise from the ground to impale and trap your enemies
2.     Poison thorns: A toxic plant that covers the ground and poisons anyone who walks past it.

Destruction:
1.	Storm Cloud: A slow but powerfull cloud of thunder
2.	Boulder Blast: Launch a giant boulder at your enemies
3.	Flash: A bright flash of light that stuns anyone near the explosion for a few seconds and sets undead on fire
4.	Solar Burst: An explosion as bright as the sun blinds anyone within a huge radius and sets undead on fire

Illusion:
1.	Trance: While casting, your enemy is oblivious to anything you do (including cutting him with your sword)	
2.	Reflect: Trick your enmies in hurting themselves when they deal damage to you	
3.	Corrupt Shadow: Trick your enemy into fighting his own shadow
4.	Shadow Army: Gather the shadows of all your enemies and turn them into an invincible army

Conjuration:
1.	Conjure Ghostblade	: Summon a ghostly blade to fight for you
2.	Conjure Ghostbattleaxe: Summon a ghostly axe to fight for you
3.	Conjure Ghostbow: Summon a ghostly bow to fight for you

----------------------------------------------------
Merchant
----------------------------------------------------
Magor can be found on the second floor of the hall of countenence of the College of Wintehold. He usually sits next to the arcane enchanter or in the chamber right of it near the diner table. If you cannot find him open the console,
type: \"help Magor\" and then use the code next to [NPC_] Magor in the command \"player.placeatme {code}\" and he should appear next to you.

----------------------------------------------------
Bugs
----------------------------------------------------
None reported yet
